challenge_place_5m.title: Symmetry's Acolyte!
challenge_place_5m.description: REALITY IS YOUR PLAYGROUND! (5 Million Blocks)

challenge_chop_5m.title: Jackson the Dog
challenge_chop_5m.description: The bestest good Boy! (5 Million Blocks)

boundenderperal.name: Reliquary Portkey
boundenderperal.usage2: Right Click to access the bound Inventory

boundeyeofender.name: Ocular Anchor
boundeyeofender.usage1: Right Click to consume and teleport to the bound location
boundeyeofender.usage2: Shift + Left Click to bind to a block

boundredstonetorch.name: Redstone Remote
boundredstonetorch.usage1: Right Click to create a 1-Tick Redstone pulse
boundredstonetorch.usage2: Shift + Left Click on a 'Target' Block to bind

boundsnowball.name: Web Snare!
boundsnowball.usage1: Throw to create a temporary web trap at the location

elevatorblock.name: Elevator Block
elevatorblock.usage3: Minimum of 2 air blocks between the elevators

adaptmenu.howtolevelup: Level up skills to increase your max power.
adaptmenu.notenoughpower: Not enough power! Each Ability Level costs 1 power.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: Agility is the ability to move quick and fluidly in the face of obstacles.

architect.name: Architect
architect.description: Structures are the building blocks of the world. Reality is in your hands, yours to control.

axes.name: Axes
axes.description1: Why chop down trees, when you could chop

brewing.name: Brewing
brewing.description: Double Bubble, Triple Bubble, Quadruple Bubble- I still cant put this potion into a cauldron

blocking.name: Blocking
blocking.description: Sticks and stones Won't break your bones, But a shield will.

crafting.name: Crafting
crafting.description: With no more pieces left to place, why not make another?

discovery.name: Discovery
discovery.description: As your perception expands, your mind unravels to discover that which you did not.

enchanting.name: Enchanting
enchanting.description: What are you going on about? Prophecies, visions, superstitious jibber-jabber?

herbalism.name: Herbalism
herbalism.description: I can't find any plants, but I can find some seeds and- is that... Weed?

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: Hunting is about the journey not the outcome.

nether.name: Nether
nether.description: From the depths of the Nether itself.

pickaxe.name: Pickaxe
pickaxe.description: Dwarves are the miners, but ive learned a thing or two in my time. IM SWEDISH

ranged.name: Ranged
ranged.description: Distance is the key to victory, and the key to survival.

rift.name: Rift
rift.description: The Rift is a caustic harness, but you have harnessed the harness.

seaborne.name: Seaborne
seaborne.description: With this skill, you may will the wonders of the water.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: The art of the unseen. Walk in the shadows.

taming.name: Taming
taming.description: The parrots and the bees... and you?

tragoul.name: TragOul
tragoul.description: Blood flows through the veins of the universe. Constricted by your hands.

chronos.name: Chronos
chronos.description: Wind the Clock of the universe, experience the flow. Break the clock, become it.

unarmed.name: Unarmed
unarmed.description: Without a weapon is not without strength.

armorup.name: Armor-Up
armorup.description: Get more armor the longer you sprint!

walljump.name: Wall Jump
walljump.description: Hold shift while mid-air against a wall to wall latch & jump!

windup.name: Wind Up
windup.description: Get faster the longer you sprint!

elevator.name: Elevator
elevator.description: This allows for you to build an elevator to teleport vertically fast!
elevator.lore1: Unlocks elevator recipe: X=WOOL, Y=ENDER PEARL

foundation.name: Magic Foundation
foundation.description: This allows for you to sneak and place a temporary foundation beneath you!

glass.name: Silk-Touch Glass
glass.description: This allows for you to essentially prevent the loss of glass blocks when you break them with an empty hand!
glass.lore1: Your hands gain silk touch for Glass

wirelessredstone.name: Redstone Remote
wirelessredstone.description: This allows for you to use a redstone torch to toggle redstone, remotely!
wirelessredstone.lore1: Target + Redstone Torch + Enderpearl = 1 Redstone Remote

placement.name: Builders Wand
placement.description: Allows for you to place multiple blocks at once to activate Sneak, and hold a block that matches your looking block and place! Keep in mind, you may need to move a tad to trigger bounding the boxes!
placement.lore2: blocks in your hand to place this

chop.name: Axe Chop
chop.description: Chop down trees by right clicking the base log!

logswap.name: Lucy's Log-Swapper
logswap.description: Change the flavor of logs in a Crafting Table!
logswap.lore1: 8 Log of any kind + 1 sapling = 8 log of the sapling's type

groundsmash.name: Axe Ground Smash
groundsmash.description: Jump, then crouch and smash all nearby enemies.

leafminer.name: Leaf-miner
leafminer.description: Allows you to break bulk leaves at once!
leafminer.lore3: You will not get the drops from the leaves (Exploit Prevention)

woodminer.name: Wood-miner
woodminer.description: Allows you to break bulk wood at once!
woodminer.lore1: Sneak, and mine WOOD/LOGS ( Not Planks )

superheated.name: Super Heated Brew
superheated.description: Brewing stands work faster the hotter they are.

darkness.name: Bottled Darkness
darkness.description: Not sure why you need this, but here you go!
darkness.lore1: NightVision Potion + Black Concrete = Potion of Darkness (30 seconds)
darkness.lore2: It Should be noted that This prevents the user from Sprinting!

haste.name: Bottled Haste
haste.lore1: Speed Potion + Amethyst Shard = Potion of Haste (60 seconds)
haste.lore2: Speed Potion + Amethyst Block = Potion of Haste-2 (30 seconds)

absorption.name: Bottled Absorption
absorption.lore1: Instant Heal + Quartz = Potion of Absorption (60 seconds)
absorption.lore2: Instant Heal + Quartz Block = Potion of Absorption-2 (30 seconds)

fatigue.name: Bottled Fatigue
fatigue.lore1: Weakness Potion + Slime Ball = Potion of Fatigue (30 seconds)
fatigue.lore2: Weakness Potion + Slime Block = Potion of Fatigue-2 (15 seconds)

hunger.name: Bottled Hunger
hunger.lore1: Awkward Potion + Rotten Flesh = Potion of Hunger (30 seconds)
hunger.lore2: Weakness Potion + Rotten Flesh = Potion of Hunger-3 (15 seconds)

nausea.name: Bottled Nausea
nausea.lore1: Awkward Potion + Brown Mushroom = Potion of Nausea (16 seconds)
nausea.lore2: Awkward Potion + Crimson Fungus = Potion of Nausea-2 (8 seconds)

blindness.name: Bottled Blindness
blindness.lore1: Awkward Potion + Ink sack = Potion of Blindness (30 seconds)
blindness.lore2: Awkward Potion + Glowing Ink Sack = Potion of Blindness-2 (15 seconds)

resistance.name: Bottled Resistance
resistance.lore1: Awkward Potion + Iron Ingot = Potion of Resistance (60 seconds)
resistance.lore2: Awkward Potion + Iron Block = Potion of Resistance-2 (30 seconds)

healthboost.name: Bottled Life
healthboost.description: When Maximum health is not enough...
healthboost.lore1: Instant-Healing Potion + Golden Apple = Potion of Health Boost (120 seconds)
healthboost.lore2: Instant-Healing Potion + Enchanted Golden Apple = Potion of Health Boost-2 (120 seconds)

decay.name: Bottled Decay
decay.description: Who knew Detritus would be so useful?
decay.lore1: Weakness Potion + Poisonous Potato = Potion of Wither (16 seconds)
decay.lore2: Weakness Potion + Crimson Roots = Potion of Wither-2 (8 seconds)

saturation.name: Bottled Saturation
saturation.description: Ya know... Im not even Hungry...
saturation.lore1: Regen Potion + Baked Potato = Potion of Saturation
saturation.lore2: Regen Potion + Hay Bale = Potion of Saturation-2

chainarmorer.name: Chains of Mephistopheles
chainarmorer.description: Allows you to craft Chainmail Armor
chainarmorer.lore1: The Crafting recipe is the same as any other, but with iron nuggets instead

horsearmorer.name: Craftable Horse Armor
horsearmorer.description: Allows you to craft Horse Armor
horsearmorer.lore1: Surround a saddle with the material you want to use to craft the armor

multiarmor.name: Multi-Armor
multiarmor.lore1: This Is an amazing skill for traveling.
multiarmor.lore2: Dynamically merge and change Armor/Elytra on the Fly!
multiarmor.lore3: To merge, shift click an item over another in your inventory.
multiarmor.lore4: To unbind Armor, Sneak-Drop the item, and it will disassemble.
multiarmor.lore5: If your MultiArmor is destroyed, you will lose all items in it.
multiarmor.lore6: I Don't need armor, It disappoints me...

deconstruction.name: Deconstruction
deconstruction.description: Deconstruct blocks & items into salvageable base components!
deconstruction.lore1: Drop any item on the ground.
deconstruction.lore2: Then, Sneak and Right-Click with Shears

reconstruction.name: Ore Reconstruction
reconstruction.description: Recraft ores from their base components!
reconstruction.lore1: 8 of the Drops and 1 Host = 1 Ore (shapeless)
reconstruction.lore3: Not including: Scraps, Quarts, and Emeralds etc...
reconstruction.lore4: Host = Encasement. ie: Stone, Netherack, Deepslate

leather.name: Craftable Leather
leather.lore1: Just toss it(rotten flesh) on the campfire!

backpacks.name: A Boutilier's Backpacks!
backpacks.description: This just Brings the Mojang Bundle into the game!
backpacks.lore1: You need to be in Survival to use this

stations.name: Portable Tables!
stations.description: Use a table in the palm of your hand!
stations.lore2: ANY ITEMS THAT YOU FORGET IN THE TABLE WHEN CLOSED ARE LOST FOREVER!
stations.lore3: Valid tables: Anvil, Crafting, Grindstone, Cartography, Stone-Cutter, Loom

skulls.name: Craftable skulls!
skulls.description: Using Materials you can Craft Mob Skulls!
skulls.lore1: Surround a Bone Block with the following to get a skull:

armor.name: World Armor
armor.description: Passive armor depending on nearby block hardness.

unity.name: Experimental Unity
unity.description: Collecting Experience Orbs adds XP to random skills.

resist.name: Experimental Resistance
resist.description: Consume experience to mitigate the damage you take from all sources
resist.lore0: This may only occur once per 15 seconds

villager.name: Villager Attraction
villager.description: Allows for you to get Better trades with villagers!
villager.lore1: This consumes XP per interaction with Villagers
villager.lore2: Chance Per interaction to consume XP, and enhance trades

lapisreturn.name: Lapis Return
lapisreturn.description: At the cost of 1 more level of XP, and has a chance to give you free lapis in return
lapisreturn.lore1: For every level, it increases the cost of enchanting, by 1, but can return upwards of 3 Lapis

quickenchant.name: Quick-Click Enchant
quickenchant.description: Enchant items by clicking enchant books directly on them.
quickenchant.lore2: Cannot Enchant an item with more than

return.name: XP Return
return.description: Enchanting XP is returned to you when you enchant an item.
return.lore1: Experience spent has a chance to be refunded when you enchant an item

haste.name: Hasty Excavator
haste.description: This will speed up the excavation process, with HASTE!
haste.lore2: x Levels of haste when you start mining ANY block.

spelunker.name: Super-Seeing Spelunker!
spelunker.description: See Ores with your eyes, but through the ground!
spelunker.lore1: Ore in your offhand, Glowberries in your main hand, and Sneak!

omnitool.name: OMNI - T.O.O.L.
omnitool.lore1: Probably the most powerful of many allows you to
omnitool.lore2: dynamically merge and change tools on the fly, based on your needs.
omnitool.lore3: To merge, shift click an item over another in your inventory.
omnitool.lore4: To unbind tools, Sneak-Drop the item, and it will disassemble.
omnitool.lore5: You can't break tools in this leatherman but you can't use broken tools
omnitool.lore7: You could use five or six tools, or just one!

growthaura.name: Growth Aura
growthaura.description: Grow nature around you in an aura

hippo.name: Herbalist's Hippo
hippo.description: Consuming food, gives you more saturation
hippo.lore1: Food) additional saturation points on consumption

myconid.name: Herbalist's Myconid
myconid.description: Gives you the ability to craft Mycelium
myconid.lore1: Any Dirt, and a Brown & Red Mushroom will craft Mycelium.

terralid.name: Herbalist's Terralid
terralid.description: Gives you the ability to craft Grass Blocks
terralid.lore1: Three Seeds, over 3 Dirt, will craft 3 Grass Blocks.

cobweb.name: Webby Creator
cobweb.description: Gives you the ability to craft Cobwebs in a Crafting Table
cobweb.lore1: Nine String, will craft a Cobweb.

mushroomblocks.name: Mushroom Maker
mushroomblocks.description: Gives you the ability to craft Mushroom Blocks in a Crafting Table
mushroomblocks.lore1: Four Mushrooms to make a block, or a block to make a stem.

hungryshield.name: Hungry Shield
hungryshield.description: Take damage to your hunger before your health.

luck.name: Herbalist's Luck
luck.description: When you break Grass/Flowers, you have a chance to get a random item
luck.lore1: Chance to get an item from breaking Flowers
luck.lore2: Chance to get an item from breaking Grass

replant.name: Harvest & Replant
replant.description: Right click a crop with a hoe to harvest & replant it.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description: Deal more damage the lower health you are (Melee)

penalty.lore1: You will Gain Poison stacks if you run out of hunger

droptoinventory.name: Items Drop-To-Inventory
droptoinventory.description: When you Kill something / Break a block With a sword it teleports the drops into your inventory
droptoinventory.lore1: Whenever an item is dropped from a mob/block you break it goes into your inventory if it can.

invisibility.name: Vanishing Step
invisibility.description: When you are struck you gain invisibility, at the cost of hunger
invisibility.lore2: x Invisibility stacks for a 3 seconds on hit

jumpboost.name: Hunter's Heights
jumpboost.description: When you are struck you gain jump-boost, at the cost of hunger
jumpboost.lore2: x Jump-Boost stacks for a 3 seconds on hit

luck.name: Hunter's Luck
luck.description: When you are struck you gain luck, at the cost of hunger
luck.lore2: x Luck stacks for a 3 seconds on hit

regen.name: Hunter's Regen
regen.description: When you are struck you gain regeneration, at the cost of hunger
regen.lore2: x Regeneration stacks for a 3 seconds on hit

resistance.name: Hunter's Resistance
resistance.description: When you are struck you gain resistance, at the cost of hunger
resistance.lore2: x Resistance stacks for a 3 seconds on hit

speed.name: Hunter's Speed
speed.description: When you are struck you gain speed, at the cost of hunger
speed.lore2: x Speed stacks for a 3 seconds on hit

strength.name: Hunter's Strength
strength.description: When you are struck you gain strength, at the cost of hunger
strength.lore2: x Strength stacks for a 3 seconds on hit

skulltoss.name: Wither Skull Throw
skulltoss.description1: Unleash your inner Wither by using
skulltoss.lore1: Seconds of cooldown between skull tosses.

witherresist.name: Wither Resistance
witherresist.description: Resists withering through the power of Netherite.
witherresist.lore2: Passive: Wearing Netherite Armor has a chance to negate

fireresist.name: Fire Resistance
fireresist.description: Resists fire by hardening your skin.
fireresist.lore1: chance to negate the burning effect!

autosmelt.name: Autosmelt
autosmelt.description: Allows you to smelt mined Vanilla ores
autosmelt.lore1: Ores that can be smelted are smelted automatically

chisel.name: Ore Chisel
chisel.description: Right Click Ores to Chisel more ore out of them, at a severe durability cost.

droptoinventory.name: Pickaxe Drop-To-Inventory
droptoinventory.description: When you break a block it teleports the item into your inventory
droptoinventory.lore1: Whenever an item is dropped from a block you break it goes into your inventory if it can.

silkspawner.name: Pickaxe Silk-Spawner
silkspawner.lore1: Makes Spawners breakable with silk touch.

veinminer.name: Veinminer
veinminer.description: Allows you to break blocks in a Vein/Cluster of Vanilla ores
veinminer.lore3: This skill does NOT group all drops together!

arrowrecovery.name: Arrow Recovery
arrowrecovery.description: Recover Arrows after you have killed an enemy.
arrowrecovery.lore1: Chance to Recover Arrows on Hit/Kill

webshot.name: Web Snare
webshot.description: Surround cobwebs around your target when you hit them!
webshot.lore1: 8 Cobwebs around a Snowball, and throw!

forceshot.name: Force Shot
forceshot.advancementlore: Land a shot from over 30 blocks away!

lungeshot.name: Lunge Shot
lungeshot.description: While falling your arrows toss you in a random direction

arrowpiercing.name: Arrow Piercing
arrowpiercing.description: Adds Piercing to projectiles! Shoot through things!

remoteaccess.name: Remote Access
remoteaccess.description: Pull from the void, and get into a marked container.
remoteaccess.lore2: This item allows you to access containers remotely
remoteaccess.lore3: Once crafted look at item to see usage

blink.name: Rift Blink
blink.description: Short ranged instant teleportation, Just a blink away!
blink.lore2: While Sprinting: Double tap Jump to

chest.name: Easy Enderchest
chest.description: Open an enderchest by Left-clicking it in your hand.
chest.lore1: Click an Enderchest in your hand to open (Just dont place it)

descent.name: Anti-Levitation
descent.description: Are you tired of being stuck in the air? This is the skill for you!
descent.lore1: Just Sneak to descend, and you will fall at a less than normal rate!

gate.name: Rift Gate
gate.lore1: CRAFTING: Emerald + Amethyst shard + Ender Pearl
gate.lore4: you can die while you are in this animation

resist.name: Rift Resistance
resist.description: Gain Resistance when using Ender Items & Abilities
resist.lore1: + Passive: Provides resistance when you use rift abilities, or Ender Items
resist.lore2: NOT Including Portable Enderchest, only things you can Consume

visage.name: Rift Visage
visage.description: Prevents Endermen from becoming aggressive if you have Enderpearls in your inventory.
visage.lore1: Endermen will not become aggressive if you have Enderpearls in your inventory.

oxygen.name: Organic Oxygen Tank
oxygen.description: Hold more oxygen in your tiny lungs!

fishersfantasy.name: Fisher's Fantasy
fishersfantasy.description: Earn more XP from fishing, and get more fish!
fishersfantasy.lore1: For each level there is a chance to get more XP and Fish!

haste.name: Turtle Miner
haste.description: While mining underwater you gain haste!
haste.lore1: Haste 3 is applied underwater while mining (stacks with AquaAffinity) after your water breathing effect wears off!

nightvision.name: Turtle's Vision
nightvision.description: While underwater, you gain Night Vision
nightvision.lore1: Simply gain Night Vision while underwater after your water breathing effect wears off!

dolphingrace.name: Dolphin's Grace
dolphingrace.description: Swim like a dolphin, without the dolphins
dolphingrace.lore3: precision german engineeeri- wait that's not right... Not Compatible with Depth Strider

ghostarmor.name: Ghost's Armor
ghostarmor.description: Slow building armor when not taking damage, Lasts for 1 hit

snatch.name: Item Snatch
snatch.description: Snatch Dropped items instantly while sneaking!

enderveil.name: Enderveil
enderveil.description: No more Pumpkins to prevent Enderman attacks

bloodyblade.name: Bloody Blade
bloodyblade.description: Strikes with your sword, cause Bleeding!
bloodyblade.lore1: Striking a Living entity with your Sword causes Bleeding

poisonedblade.name: Poisoned Blade
poisonedblade.description: Strikes with your sword, cause Poison!
poisonedblade.lore1: Striking a Living entity with your Sword causes Poison

damage.name: Tame Damage
damage.description: Increase your tamed animal damage dealt.

thorns.name: Thorns
thorns.description: Reflect damage back to your attacker!

globe.name: Globe of Pain
globe.description: Divide the Damage you deal based on the number of enemies around you!
globe.lore1: The more enemies around you, the less damage you deal to each of them

healing.name: Will of Pain
healing.description: Regain health based on the damage you deal!
healing.lore1: Harming things has never felt so good! Heal from Damage Dealt
healing.lore2: There is a 3 Second damage window, for healing and a 1 Second cooldown

lance.name: Corpse Lances
lance.description: Killing an enemy or having an ability kill an enemy, spawns a lance that deals damage to a nearby enemy!
lance.lore1: Lances will Seek out from anything you kill, AND if This ability kills an enemy.
lance.lore2: Sacrifice a portion of your life in order to create the lances (this can kill you)

glasscannon.name: Glass Cannon
glasscannon.description: Bonus Unarmed Damage the lower your armor value is

suckerpunch.name: Sucker Punch
suckerpunch.lore2: Damage increases by with your speed while punching
